Title: Relates to providing a re-entry employment incentive tax credit
Summary: Relates to providing a re-entry employment incentive tax credit for taxpayers who hire individuals convicted of a felony in the last five years and who have been released from a correctional facility or are serving a period of post-release supervision in the last five years.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing a re-entry employment incentive tax credit
